definitions.definition: firm and not changing in your friendship with or support for a person or an organization, or in your belief in your principles:
If your husband, wife, or partner is faithful, he or she does not have a sexual relationship with anyone else:
examples: Was your wife faithful during your marriage?

definitions.definition: to continue to support or follow something:
examples: He remained faithful to the regime when so many others spoke out against it.

definitions.definition: someone who continues to support someone or something:
examples: He gave a rousing speech to a room full of party faithfuls (= faithful supporters of a political party).
